description: APROCASURT (Asociación de productores de cacao del Sur del Tolimais) an association of cocoa producers located in Limón, Tolima. Established in 2008, it aims to unite local farmers to enhance cocoa production and improve livelihoods. With 82 members, the association focuses on sustainable practices, including the processing of cocoa into end products. It fosters community collaboration, supports economic growth, and seeks to achieve organic certification while addressing challenges like climate change and market fluctuations.
name: APROCASURT
